game.name: Hank: Drowning On Dry Land
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 키보드 전용 옵션, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Think BATMAN, but always DRUNK and he can TIME-TRAVEL. Sink into Hank's comic book world and escape The Unraveler's trap. Play a dangerous time-bending co-op with your past self.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Think BATMAN, but always DRUNK and he can TIME-TRAVEL. Sink into Hank's comic book world and escape The Unraveler's trap. Play a dangerous time-bending co-op with your past self.
